meanings.definition: A type of coffee made with espresso and steamed milk.
meanings.sent1: In the morning, I enjoy a cappuccino with frothy milk.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a cappuccino at the café.
meanings.sent3: The cappuccino was so hot, it could have melted the spoon!
meanings.sent4: The cappuccino was a warm hug in a cup.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cappuccino filled the room, inviting everyone to take a sip.

meanings.sent1: He sipped his cappuccino slowly, savoring every drop.
meanings.sent2: The barista handed her a steaming cappuccino.
meanings.sent3: The cappuccino cup was so delicate, it felt like holding a cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her cappuccino cup overflowed with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The porcelain cappuccino cup gleamed under the café lights, tempting her to indulge.
